question_text: Which of the following are true of VA LCD panels? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Use vertical alignment of crystals when idle
Offer better contrast ratios than IPS
Have slower response time than TN
correct_answer: Use vertical alignment of crystals when idle
Offer better contrast ratios than IPS
Have slower response time than TN
explanation: VA panels are known for high contrast and deeper blacks due to vertical crystal alignment, but tend to have slower response times than TN.
